front.title: Policy Considerations for Changes to RFCs

abstract.t: This document describes policies applicable when the text of an RFC is modified after it has been approved for publication. About This Document This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Status information for this document may be found at https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/draft-carpenter-rswg-rfc-changes/. Discussion of this document takes place on the RSWG Working Group mailing list (mailto:rswg@rfc-editor.org), which is archived at https://mailarchive.ietf.org/arch/browse/rswg/.
